name: MattTheMetal
description:
In 2077, the virtual game competition Matt the metal became very popular. I also decided to try myself in this.

The main mistake in my life...

This happened on April 3 at 22:20.

Over time, I began to show good results, even won prizes at local tournaments.

"Before going to bed, it's not bad at least to reach the 5th boss...", I thought.

After the first wave, I suspected something was wrong. Opponents sometimes began to get lost in space and spin in place.

"It would be necessary to write a bug report," I decided and was about to leave the game.

Button does not work...

You can't even collapse. And why does everything feel so real ?!

After a couple of hours of wandering my eyes around the menu, I realized that I was just locked up here.

In the worst case, you will have to spend the rest of your life for endless destruction of opponents and a set of points.

If it can end at all...
